verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Hark! ’tis the Shepherd’s voice I hear, Out in the desert dark and drear, Calling the sheep who’ve gone astray Far from the Shepherd’s fold away.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Bring them in, bring them in, Bring them in from the fields of sin; Bring them in, bring them in, Bring the wand’ring ones to Jesus.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Who’ll go and help this Shepherd kind, Help Him the wand’ring ones to find? Who’ll bring the lost ones to the fold, Where they’ll be sheltered from the cold?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Out in the desert hear their cry, Out on the mountains wild and high; Hark! ’tis the Master, speaks to thee, “Go find my sheep where’er they be.”
